INDIGOProperty¶

class INDIGO_Client.INDIGOProperty(tag, device)[source]¶

This is a class representation of a property in the INDIGO protocol.

Variables:
  • name – Name of the property.
  • device – Instance of the device that is part of the property.
  • attributes – List of all attributes that the current property has.
  • elements – List of all elements that are part of the current property.
  • lastUpdate – It’s a variable that indicates the last time the property was updated.
  • blobMode – It indicate if the BLOB mode is Never or URL.
sendValues(elementNamesAndValues)[source]¶

Function that sends the values to the server, but first applies a filter to send only the correct values and returns an error in case they are wrong.

Parameters:elementNamesAndValues (dict) – Dictionary of the names of elements and its values.
